node.name: Visual Rules Enterprise Platform
node.shortdescription:
Visual Rules is an especially intuitive and high-performance Business Rules Management System for creating and managing business rules. Business logic is modeled, tested, monitored and managed in a simple but powerful graphical interface. Visual Rules covers the complete rule management process. Via a uniquely comprehensive graphical modeling approach, Visual Rules provides an advanced collaboration platform for business analysts and IT.

Visual Rules is designed for integration of rule management into applications and Eclipse-based platforms.

Robust new features have been introduced in this version to enable the business with powerful new tools and functionality. In addition, Eclipse 3.5 is fully supported.

Visual Rules Modeler
* New wizard for importing MS Excel tables as Visual Rules decision tables
* New wizard for extracting branches from huge flow rule sets as new flow rules including automatic analysis and generation of required data elements
* Copy and move rule tests to other rules
* Definition of meta data for rule models, rules, input/output data elements, constant data elements, structures and attributes; meta data also available during runtime
* Display of rule model contents in project and rule explorer only within Visual Rules rule projects
* Enhanced highlighting of rule comparison results
* New filters for audit logs within Team Server Explorer
* Sortable tables in the Properties view
* Support of Eclipse 3.5

Visual Rules Team Server
* Management of locked resources via web console

Visual Rules QA & Deployment Tools
* Maven Packaging inserts *.vrmeta files automatically into the artifact

New & Noteworthy | Download
